sentences.sentence: And not the thin ghost that I now frailly follow!
sentences.translation: 而现今我恍然跟随的，却是如此单薄的魂灵！

sentences.sentence: However the present theorists appear actually to the comprehensive enforcement of administrative law research extremely frailly.
